title: Thresh when Senna is confirmed as a champion

replies.body:
That's not Thresh; it's the game's lore.

Lucian should give Senna her gun back and get his base AS cut in half.
That would make him actually useless.

> [{quoted}](name=Xphineas,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XiEYLvAa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-12T21:20:58.607+0000)
>
> That would make him actually useless.

Good

> [{quoted}](name=Xphineas,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XiEYLvAa,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-10-12T21:20:58.607+0000)

http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=XiEYLvAa,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-10-12T21:15:36.678+0000)
>
> That's not Thresh; it's the game's lore.
> 
> Lucian should give Senna her gun back and get his base AS cut in half.

nah, it probably turns out that a single gun can be used as a submachinegun if you pump enough energy into it.

That or she has her own brand new toys courtesy of some vault on the isles.
